hint: Push filters into CTEs early, filter dimension tables before joins, and isolate customer dimension prefetching to reduce row counts in all union branches.
Isolate date filtering into a dedicated CTE, split the UNION ALL by sale_type, and share filtered date_dim across all three sales channels to eliminate redundant filtering.
Create separate prefiltered CTEs for each date range (1999, 2000) and each dimension, then pre-join dimensions with facts before the main union to reduce join cardinality.

Transform the self-join pattern to use EXISTS, restructure OR-like conditions in final filters to UNION ALL branches, and attempt to consolidate the three sales channel aggregations into a single pass using conditional aggregation.
